ygData.subject: Re: Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: This thread is cracking me up.  Anyways, I know that one of the largest guilds out there, Sisterhood of the Rose??, is all female toons, and like 300+ members.
ygData.messageBody:
This thread is cracking me up. Anyways, I know that one of the
largest guilds out there, Sisterhood of the Rose??, is all female
toons, and like 300+ members. I don't know how many are actual
female gamers. I can tell you that three of the best gamers I play
with are women. They are guildmates, and I know they're female
because their significant others are also in the guild. They have
all been playing a LONG time and know the game well.

Good to know threads don't always have to be about critical gaming
strategies. :)



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Richard" <soulfire18_01@y...>
wrote:
> Me and my friend were having a discussion the other night while he
> was playing eq, he was talking to his eq wife, and i was messing
> with him, and if brought up the questions of, are there really
girls
> that play eq, or are the all guys. Then he asked me, if there are
> girls that play, are they cute? Just curious.
